metadata.title: CVE-2021-30002 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.11.3 when a webcamdevice exists. video_usercopy in drivers/media/v4l2-core/v4l2-ioctl.c has amemory leak for large arguments, aka CID-fb18802a338b.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
